Content.Text:
<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ladies and gentlemen, we have been blessed
with another beautiful, clear evening this year.
Let us all enjoy this year's <RED>Starlight Gala</RED>!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whether you're spending the evening with
friends or family, I invite you to nestle down in a
comfortable spot and enjoy the evening.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
C'mon, let's go find a good spot to kick back
and look up at the sky.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well then, what do you say we find a
comfortable spot with a nice view?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Let's go look for a good place to watch.
Someplace comfy where we can stretch out and
relax would be great.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let us go find a good spot where we can fully
take in the magnificent view.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's go find a good spot. I wanna kick back and
enjoy the view.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come on, let's go find a spot where we can
really kick back and enjoy this evening.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There must be a spot with a better view. Would
you go and find us a good place to observe the
stars?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The stars are so beautiful tonight...let's go find a
good spot that'll give us a clear view.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
C'mon, let's hurry up and find a good place so
we can enjoy the stars!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's go and find a really good spot to stargaze,
okay?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I know an excellent spot where we can view the
night sky. Come on.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The night's not gettin' any younger. Let's go find
us a comfy spot for watching the stars.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Man, they're so pretty! Look at 'em twinkle up
there.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Y'know, just looking at the stars is actually really
fun.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I wonder if we'll get to see a shooting star...

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The sky is exceptionally lovely tonight. I am
impressed!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The clear air here makes the stars shine even
more brightly.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I could gaze at a sky like this for hours and never
feel bored.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I've always enjoyed the Starlight Gala. Maybe I
should've brought along some wine to sip...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ahhh...they're so beautiful that my eyes are
glued to the sky.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This has been awesome. It really takes me back
to when I'd come here as a kid.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow. The sky looks so beautiful tonight!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The stars look so gorgeous, glittering like
gemstones set in the crown of the night.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's mind-boggling to think the starlight we see
now was emitted eons before we were born,
isn't it?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The stars are real pretty tonight. I could lose
track of time, watching them.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's too dark to see clearly, but I bet everyone
here's all looking up at the stars right now.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Tonight's a new moon, so the stars look even
brighter than normal. They've got the stage to
themselves.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Look at that velvet-black night sky, scattered
with glittering stars from one end to the other.
It's like each one of them is a diamond.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The larger, brighter stars are always pretty, but
I've always liked the small ones you have to look
for.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's so easy to lose track of time just gazing up
at the sky like this...

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
My, how lovely! It has been forever since I last
enjoyed gazing up at the night sky.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Had I known they'd be so lovely, I'd have ordered
a viewing area set up in my garden so that we
could enjoy them in comfort.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I think it would have been perfect if we could
have had a small buffet to enjoy while viewing
the stars.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The starlight we see is actually light that has
been traveling for millions of years. It's strange
to think about how old it is.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, how spectacular! If you look over there, you
can see the band of the galaxy shining. This is
the kind of world it's worth stepping into.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Looking up at the sky, I remember stories I read
as a child about heroes chosen by the stars...

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oooh, how pretty!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm so glad we had good weather this year. I
mean, it all would have been for nothing if it
rained tonight.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a great spot! I can see everything from
here.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ooh, they're so pretty! Twinkle, twinkle, little
star. ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, it's so breathtaking... All the forest
animals are so lucky that they get to see this
sight every night!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm so glad I got to watch this. It was really
pretty.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It has been a long time since I was last able to
take the time to enjoy the stars. They're really
quite lovely.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Staying out this late in the cold is bad for your
health...but the sky is so lovely, I think we can
allow it for one night.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
There are so many stars up there. The sheer
number makes finding the constellations rather
difficult.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I've always enjoyed looking up at the stars.
Though, I guess I've got practice gazing into the
distance.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The mountains are really dark at night, compared
to in town. That makes it that much easier to
see the stars.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Uh-oh. I think I'm starting to get a crick in my
neck.
Wow! There must be millions of them up there!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Lookit! Lookit! Aren't they pretty?
Yeah! They're really pretty!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow! They cover the whole sky!

This view really takes your breath away. Is
everybody enjoying themselves?
Soooo pretty! I could watch these all night long!

That was loads of fun! Let's come again next
year!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ladies and gentlemen, this concludes this year's
Starlight Gala. I hope you all had a wonderful
time. Please take care on your way home.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thanks for coming out with me. I had a blast!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
We should come again next year. G'night!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I was glad for the chance to enjoy tonight with
you.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
We should do this again sometime. Good night.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, I had a great time comin' out with you
tonight.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'd better get going. Have a good one.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I had a very enjoyable time tonight.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
We should do this again sometime. Good night.

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I had fun tonight. Thanks for asking me.

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
We should do something like it again sometime.
Night.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, I had a lot of fun being here with you
tonight.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
But it's late, and morning will be here before I
know it. G'night.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Tonight was very pleasant.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'd be happy to accompany you again on
something this enjoyable, so do remember to
invite me, okay?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you for a wonderful evening. I really had a
good time with you tonight.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
We should do this again sometime. Good night.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thanks for hanging out with me tonight. It was
lots of fun!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
We should do this again sometime. But it's
getting late now, and I need to get to sleep.
G'night!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I had fun tonight. Thanks for taking me out.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'd love to do it again, if you're feeling up for it.
Good night!

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you for spending this evening with me. I
had a good time with you.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Should the opportunity arise, I would enjoy
doing something like this again. Good night.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, thanks for seeing me home. I had a swell
time tonight.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Let's do it again sometime, okay? G'night.
